media:group.media:title: Lunz - Upper See (offical video)
media:group.media:description:
Lunz 20th Anniversary Special Edition pre-order: North- and Sout America: https://www.curiousmusic.us Europe and rest of the world: https://www.groenland.com/shop
*** Groenland Records and Curious Music are pleased to announce the 20th anniversary special edition release of Lunz by Tim Story and Hans-Joachim Roedelius.
Lunz 20th Anniversary Special Edition releases on October 26th, 2022 (Roedelius’ 88th birthday) and is available for pre-order now: Curious Music webshop for North- and South America: https://www.curiousmusic.us/all-products/lunz-by-tim-story-and-hans-joachim-roedelius-20th-anniversary-special-edition-2lp-180-gram-vinyl-and-cd-with-four-collectors-covers Groenland Records webshop for Europe: https://www.groenland.com/product/hans-joachim-roedelius-tim-story-lunz-20th-anniversary-special-edition-cd-2/
This very special release comes newly remastered by Tim Story as a digtial download, collector’s edition cd with four covers (limited to 250 per cover worldwide), and a double 180-gram audiophile vinyl release with hand-numbered and signed art print (limited to 500 copies worldwide).
Lunz was the second collaboration of the German electronic music legend Hans-Joachim Roedelius (Cluster, Harmonia) and Grammy-nominated American composer/producer Tim Story. Lunz was the culmination of the composers’ 25-year mutual admiration and friendship, and the beginning of a prolific partnership that spawned six acclaimed albums, audio art installations and live concerts across Europe and the US.
When Lunz originally hit the record shop shelves of London, listeners knew of the Roedelius/Story collaboration only via a few concerts and the abstract musique concrete of their limited edition cd Persistence of Memory. Lunz quickly changed that with 12 timeless and beautiful miniatures, each creating a unique sense of time and place with a surreal blend of melody, texture and mood. Lunz inhabits a world all its own, of lush acoustics and angular electronics, translucent pianos and dark ambiences. It's a mysterious world where the innocent and the distressed occupy the same singular environment, coalescing perfectly. 20 years on, Lunz remains a fan favorite and a landmark addition to both artists body of work.
The first-ever appearance of Lunz on vinyl comes in a spectacular double vinyl gatefold and hand-numbered Lunz art prints signed by Story/Roedelius. The cd is available in four different collector covers designed by Sebastian Boecking. Both vinyl and cd contain two previously unreleased bonus tracks from the Lunz sessions.

media:group.media:title: Nina Hagen - 16 Tons (official video)
media:group.media:description:
New single "16 Tons" out now. Streaming everywhere: https://ninahagen.lnk.to/16tons
New album "Unity" out on december 9, 2022. Pre-order here: https://ninahagen.lnk.to/unity https://www.groenland.com/en/product/nina-hagen-unity
Kamera & Schnitt: Sebastian Vogt Hair & Make Up: Marvin Glissmann, Julia Hahn, Eleonore Ising Darsteller*innen: Alexander Bettendorf, Rita Bergholm, Marie Biermann, Alyssa Grace, Nina Herzberg, Kat Frankie, Yü Jin, Josephinex, Cavana Hazelton, Dota Kehr, Max Kroll, Irene Moebius, Hendrik Otremba, Mille Petrozza, Walter Schönauer, Nellie Thalbach, Hendrik von Holtum, Frank, Vollmann, Sanda Weigel

media:group.media:title: Lunz - Iota (Visualizer)
media:group.media:description:
"We finished "Iota" in 2012, ten years after "Lunz's" original release, from recordings Joachim and I had made during the original "Lunz" sessions. I'd always loved Achim's piano part, but it was unfinished, and I never quite got around to doing it the justice it deserved. Now - somehow - another ten years have passed, and it feels inseparable." Tim Story
Groenland Records and Curious Music are pleased to announce the 20th anniversary special edition release of Lunz by Tim Story and Hans-Joachim Roedelius.
Lunz 20th Anniversary Special Edition releases on October 26th, 2022 (Roedelius’ 88th birthday) and is available for pre-order now: Curious Music webshop for North- and South America: https://www.curiousmusic.us/all-products/lunz-by-tim-story-and-hans-joachim-roedelius-20th-anniversary-special-edition-2lp-180-gram-vinyl-and-cd-with-four-collectors-covers Groenland Records webshop for Europe: https://www.groenland.com/product/hans-joachim-roedelius-tim-story-lunz-20th-anniversary-special-edition-cd-2/
This very special release comes newly remastered by Tim Story as a digtial download, collector’s edition cd with four covers (limited to 250 per cover worldwide), and a double 180-gram audiophile vinyl release with hand-numbered and signed art print (limited to 500 copies worldwide).
Lunz was the second collaboration of the German electronic music legend Hans-Joachim Roedelius (Cluster, Harmonia) and Grammy-nominated American composer/producer Tim Story. Lunz was the culmination of the composers’ 25-year mutual admiration and friendship, and the beginning of a prolific partnership that spawned six acclaimed albums, audio art installations and live concerts across Europe and the US.
When Lunz originally hit the record shop shelves of London, listeners knew of the Roedelius/Story collaboration only via a few concerts and the abstract musique concrete of their limited edition cd Persistence of Memory. Lunz quickly changed that with 12 timeless and beautiful miniatures, each creating a unique sense of time and place with a surreal blend of melody, texture and mood. Lunz inhabits a world all its own, of lush acoustics and angular electronics, translucent pianos and dark ambiences. It's a mysterious world where the innocent and the distressed occupy the same singular environment, coalescing perfectly. 20 years on, Lunz remains a fan favorite and a landmark addition to both artists body of work.
The first-ever appearance of Lunz on vinyl comes in a spectacular double vinyl gatefold and hand-numbered Lunz art prints signed by Story/Roedelius. The cd is available in four different collector covers designed by Sebastian Boecking. Both vinyl and cd contain two previously unreleased bonus tracks from the Lunz sessions.
